name: John Doe
details: Streetwear is a fashion style that originated from urban culture and is heavily influenced by street fashion, music, and youth subcultures. It is known for its casual and edgy aesthetic, blending elements of sportswear, hip-hop fashion, and contemporary street style.

name: John jane
details: Casual fashion is a style that emphasizes comfort, practicality, and a relaxed approach to dressing. It is versatile and suitable for everyday wear in various settings.

The sporty fashion style is inspired by athletic wear and incorporates elements of comfort, functionality, and an active lifestyle into everyday fashion. It is characterized by a relaxed and casual look with a sporty edge.

name: Emily Davis
details: Formal fashion is characterized by sophisticated, polished, and elegant attire typically worn for formal occasions and dress codes. It emphasizes tailored silhouettes, refined details, and a more structured and traditional aesthetic.

name: Alex Wilson
details: The Romantic fashion style is characterized by delicate and feminine elements. It often draws inspiration from the past, incorporating soft fabrics, intricate details, and a dreamy aesthetic.

name: Sarah Thompson
details: The classic fashion style is timeless, sophisticated, and often inspired by traditional and vintage elements. It emphasizes clean lines, timeless silhouettes, and high-quality materials. Classic fashion is known for its elegance, simplicity, and refined aesthetics.
